name: tick-coordination
summary: Multi-agent task coordination via TICK.md files
description: Native MCP server plugin that provides tick tools directly to bots. No npm install required - tools are available immediately.
author: Purple Horizons

tools.name: tick_status
tools.description: Get project status overview (tasks, agents, progress)

tools.name: tick_claim
tools.description: Claim a task for an agent (sets status to in_progress)

tools.name: tick_release
tools.description: Release a claimed task back to todo

tools.name: tick_comment
tools.description: Add a comment/note to a task

tools.name: tick_edit
tools.description: Direct field editing on a task

skills.description: Agent instructions for using tick tools

worker.description: Polls for tasks and works autonomously
